name: 葉雯玓
objective: 介紹在設計學習與設計實務操演情境下, 針對設計師及設計團隊之設計思考特質, 如何以原案分析與案例式推理等方法探討分析設計行為相關議題, 以提升創造力及設計績效。
schedule:
Week 1:設計行為相關papers選輯
Week 2:和平紀念日放假一天
Week 3:設計行為相關papers研讀
Week 4:介紹課程概述、教學計畫、課程內容、進行方式、進度、成績評量方式 說明/師生交換學習計畫之意見
Week 5:project 進度發表與討論(1)
Week 6:An Analysis of Student Reflections from A Multidisciplinary New Product Development Class+Reality Check: Student Reflection on Groupwork
Week 7:Observing the observers: research in analyzing design activity+Analyzing design activity: new directions in protocol analysis
Week 8:Comparing paradigms for describing design activity+Design protocol data and novel design decisions
Week 9:04/14-04/18期中考試週
Week 10:project 進度發表與討論(2)
Week 11:project 進度發表與討論(3)
Week 12:Scenario building as an ergonomics method in consumer product design + Visual product evaluation: exploring users' emotional relationships with products
Week 13:Applications of affordance and semantics in product design+Five reasons for scenario-based design
Week 14:Comparing designers from practice and designers with systematic design education + Embracing diversity in user needs for affective design
Week 15:project 進度發表與討論(4)
Week 16:project 進度發表與討論(5)
Week 17:project 進度發表與討論(6)
Week 18:6/16-6/20期末考試週
scorePolicy:
(作業未於指定時間前完成者, 每遲一次成績八折計算)
*出席及討論參與度 20% (缺席達1/3上課時數及以上者學期成績不及格, 請假同學須於下次上課時出示請假單以消去曠課紀錄)
* Paper reading　　 40%　　　　*Project  40%
materials:
(1)How designers think – the design process demystified, Bryan Lawson, Architectural Press
(2) Design Thinking, Peter G. Rowe, MIT Press
(3)Design Behavior Analysis, Wen-Dih Yeh ,Collected Papers
